name: nanoCom
tag_list: video, chat, live, video-chat, nanocom, ispq
overview:
nanoCom Corporation is a pioneer in providing affordable, cross-platform video chat and conferencing software. nanoCom develops and markets innovative online applications and services using advanced technologies, such as peer-to-peer Internet, human computer interaction and advanced image processing. The company’s vision is to make Internet video communication commonplace for people around the world.

Its products include Netvidea, BuddyVision and iSpQ VideoChat. These products have reached over 3 million users globally.
